languages.text: "Не обманывайтесь, Ваша Светлость. Это при вас она зовет меня драгоценной розой. При своих я обычно "засранец с пушкой". {n}Кор добродушно ухмыляется.{/n}

"Don't let her fool you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She's only calling me a precious rose 'cause you're here. When it's just us, I'm lucky if I get 'that arsehole with the gun.'" {n}Kor chuckles good-naturedly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не обманывайтесь, Ваша Светлость. Это при вас она зовет меня драгоценной розой. При своих я обычно "засранец с пушкой". {n}Кор добродушно ухмыляется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Don't let her fool you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She's only calling us me a precious rose 'cause you're here. When it's just us, I'm lucky if I get 'that arsehole with the gun.'" {n}Kor chuckles good-naturedly.{/n}
traits.speaker: Kor

traits.locale_text: "Don't let her fool you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She's only calling us me a precious rose 'cause you're here. When it's just us, I'm lucky if I get 'that arsehole with the gun.'" {n}Kor chuckles good-naturedly.{/n}
traits.speaker: Kor

traits.locale_text: "Don't let her fool you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She's only calling us me a precious rose 'cause you're here. When it's just us, I'm lucky if I get 'that arsehole with the gun.'" {n}Kor chuckles good-naturedly.{/n}
traits.speaker: Kor

traits.locale_text: "Don't let her fool you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She's only calling me a precious rose 'cause you're here. When it's just us, I'm lucky if I get 'that arsehole with the gun.'" {n}Kor chuckles good-naturedly.{/n}
traits.speaker: Kor

languages.text: “可别听她胡说八道，大人。她之所以说我是什么‘珍贵的玫瑰’，不过是因为你也在这儿罢了。等到只剩我们两个的时候，哪怕她能叫我‘那个拿枪的王八蛋’，都已经算好听的了。”{n}科尔善意地笑了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't let her fool you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She's only calling me a precious rose 'cause you're here. When it's just us, I'm lucky if I get 'that arsehole with the gun.'" {n}Kor chuckles good-naturedly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “可别听她胡说八道，大人。她之所以说我们是什么‘珍贵的玫瑰’，不过是因为你也在这里。等到只剩我们两个的时候，她要是能叫我‘那个拿枪的王八蛋’，就已经算好听的了。”{n}科尔善意地笑了起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: Kor

languages.text: 「彼女に惑わされないでください。彼女は、あなたがここにいるから、私を貴重なバラと呼んでいるだけです。我々だけのときは、『あの銃を持ったろくでなし』と呼ばれれば、まだマシなくらいですよ」{n}コーは気さくにわらう。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't let her fool you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She's only calling me a precious rose 'cause you're here. When it's just us, I'm lucky if I get 'that arsehole with the gun.'" {n}Kor chuckles good-naturedly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「彼女に惑わされないでください。彼女は、あなたがここにいるから、私を貴重なバラと呼んでいるだけです。我々だけのときは、『あの銃を持ったろくでなし』と呼ばれれば、まだマシなくらいですよ」{n}コーは気さくにわらう。{/n}
traits.speaker: Kor

languages.text: «No deje que le engañe, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Solo me llama una rosa preciosa porque usted está aquí. Si estamos solos, tengo suerte si me llama un "capullo con pistola"». {n}Kor ríe alegremente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't let her fool you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She's only calling me a precious rose 'cause you're here. When it's just us, I'm lucky if I get 'that arsehole with the gun.'" {n}Kor chuckles good-naturedly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No deje que le engañe, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Solo me llama una rosa preciosa porque usted está aquí. Si estamos solos, tengo suerte si me llama un "capullo con pistola"». {n}Kor ríe alegremente.{/n}
traits.speaker: Kor

languages.text: « Ne vous laissez pas berner par ses belles paroles, Votre Seigneurie. Elle m'appelle sa "précieuse rose" uniquement parce que vous êtes là. Quand on est entre nous, c'est plutôt "l'autre connard avec le flingue", ou pire si elle est de mauvaise humeur. » {n}Kor rit de bon cœur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't let her fool you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She's only calling me a precious rose 'cause you're here. When it's just us, I'm lucky if I get 'that arsehole with the gun.'" {n}Kor chuckles good-naturedly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous laissez pas berner par ses belles paroles, Votre Seigneurie. Elle m'appelle sa "précieuse rose" uniquement parce que vous êtes là. Quand on est entre nous, c'est plutôt "l'autre connard avec le flingue", ou pire si elle est de mauvaise humeur. » {n}Kor rit de bon cœur.{/n}
traits.speaker: Kor

languages.text: "Lasst Euch nicht hinters Licht führen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bin nur die kostbare Rose, weil Ihr gerade hier seid. Wenn wir unter uns sind, kann ich von Glück sprechen, nur 'das Arschloch mit der Knarre' abzubekommen." {n}Kor kichert gutmütig.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't let her fool you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She's only calling me a precious rose 'cause you're here. When it's just us, I'm lucky if I get 'that arsehole with the gun.'" {n}Kor chuckles good-naturedly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lasst Euch nicht hinters Licht führen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bin nur die kostbare Rose, weil Ihr gerade hier seid. Wenn wir unter uns sind, kann ich von Glück sprechen, nur 'das Arschloch mit der Knarre' abzubekommen." {n}Kor kichert gutmütig.{/n}
traits.speaker: Kor

languages.text: "Sizi aldatmasına izin vermeyin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bana paha biçilemez gül demesinin tek sebebi, sizin burada olmanız. Baş başayken 'şu silahlı götelek' olarak hitap ediliyorsam şanslıyım demektir." {n}Kor, içten bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't let her fool you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She's only calling me a precious rose 'cause you're here. When it's just us, I'm lucky if I get 'that arsehole with the gun.'" {n}Kor chuckles good-naturedly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sizi aldatmasına izin vermeyin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bana paha biçilemez gül demesinin tek sebebi sizin burada olmanız. Baş başayken 'şu silahlı götelek' olarak hitap ediliyorsam şanslıyım demektir." {n}Kor içten bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Kor
